oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of plane of nutrition and as-fed milk replacer temperature on abomasal dynamics in Holstein calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kasl, B. A.
Hoff, C. K.
Silva, T. H.
Caetano, I.
Machado, V. S.
Carroll, J. A.
Ballou, M. A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: milk replacer
abomasal disease
abomasitis
bloat
fluid milk nutrition
plane of nutrition
temperature
abomasum
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fluctuations in as-fed milk replacer have been implicated as a potential cause of abomasal diseases, including abomasitis and bloat. As feeding preweaned calves a higher plane of fluid milk nutrition becomes increasingly common, understanding how specific feeding management factors affect the abomasal compartment will aid in optimizing milk ration development and implementation. The objectives were to determine the effects of plane of nutrition (PON) and as-fed milk replacer temperature (AFMRT) on the functionality and environment of the abomasum in healthy Holstein calves.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2020; 388
